name: Metal Neko (DEMO)
description:
This game is about a cat name Scarlet and going to stop the evil,and this game is my first game i'm upload on itich.io

Edit:
Now this game is just 185 mb,so you don,t  have to be afraid to download for a long time

For controller:
Z=Confirm
X=Cencel\Open Menu
Shift=Run
F4=Full Screen

Note:
this game is still demo and for gamejam,so  it's just have a short features.
